name: Snout, Inc.
description: Developer of a digital check-in application designed to improve the pet parents' experience at veterinary practices. The company's application offers financial options, manages medical records across locations, and streamlines veterinary hospital workflow, enabling pet parents and veterinarians to refocus on what matters most, giving pets the care they need and deserve.
one_liner: Developer of a digital check-in application designed to improve the pet parents' experience at veterinary practices. The company's application offers financial options, manages medical records across locations, and streamlines veterinary hospital workflow, enabling pet parents and veterinarians to refocus on what matters most, giving pets the care they need and deserve.
